file_content.text: Crew skill operation successful.

Invalid item!

You don't have enough room in your inventory.
You are too far away.
You are too far away from the crew skill trainer.
You don't know that recipe.
That resource was already gathered.
General crew skill error.
Unknown crew skill.
Crew skill already known.
Cannot have multiple crafting skills. You must unlearn '<<1>>' before you can learn '<<2>>'.
You do not have the appropriate crafting table.
This companion is currently fully tasked.
That item cannot be reverse engineered.
No reverse engineering information for item '<<1>>'.
You do not have the base version of this schematic.
You do not have sufficient credits to undertake this mission.
You do not have sufficient credits to learn this schematic.
There are no missions defined for the crew skill '<<1>>'.
You have trained the crew skill '<<1>>'.
You have untrained the crew skill '<<1>>'.
Your skill in <<1>> is now <<2>>.
You learned the schematic '<<1>>'.
Your companion <<1>> has crafted <<2>>.
Your companion <<1>> has completed the mission '<<2>>'.
Unknown crew skill result.
You need at least one companion in order to open the crew management window.
You unlocked the mission '<<1>>'.
Your companion <<1>> has crafted <<2>> x<<3>>.
You must unlearn one of your crew skills before you can learn '<<1>>'.
You must unlearn your current crafting skill before you can learn '<<1>>'.
You have chosen to learn '<<1>>' as your first crew skill.
You have chosen to learn '<<1>>' as your second crew skill.
You have chosen to learn '<<1>>' as your third crew skill.
You may learn up to three crew skills. Only one may be a crafting skill.
Train
<<1>> has crafted <<2>> for you.
<<1>> has crafted <<2>> x<<3>> for you.
You have no available companions to fulfill the crafting request from <<1>>.
<<1>> has refused your crafting request.
You have already deployed the maximum number of companions for your level.
The maker's name has been worn completely off.
You can't reverse engineer that while looting.
You need <<1>> of those items to attempt reverse engineering.
That mission is already active!
Your companion <<1>> has crafted <<2>> with great success!
Your companion <<1>> has crafted <<2>> x<<3>> with great success!
<<1>> has crafted <<2>> for you with great success!
<<1>> has crafted <<2>> x<<3>> for you with great success!
Your companion is off selling junk.
Can not reverse engineer an equipped item
Reverse engineering failed. Item is part of another transaction.
You can only reverse engineer items in your inventory.
This trainer has nothing to teach you.
That companion is unavailable right now.
This requires <<1>>.
You have trained <<1>>.
You must first unlearn a Crew Skill before you can do that. Additional Crew Skill slots may be purchased from the Cartel Market.
You have deployed the maximum number of companions for your level and subscription status.
You may learn <<1>> Crew <<1[/Skill/Skills]>>. Only one of these may be a crafting skill. Additional Crew Skill slots may be purchased from the Cartel Market.
You cannot reactivate that Crew Skill until you unlock an additional Crew Skill slot. Additional Crew Skill Slots are available on the Cartel Market.

<<1>> has been deactivated. You retain your skill level and schematics for the Crew Skill but you may not access it without an additional Crew Skill Slot. Additional Crew Skill Slots are available on the Cartel Market.
<<1>> has been reactivated.
You have gained an additional crew skill. Visit a crew skill trainer to use it.
You have <<1>> unused profession slots but <<2>> inactive professions. See the crew skill trainer of the profession you wish to reactivate to activate it.
